AddressInfo.Title: Roch Castle
AddressInfo.AccessComments:
By car

You can plan you journey by car using www.theaa.com/route-planner. Simply enter your postcode and ours, which is SA62 6AQ to get your travel options or directions. 

The car park is located directly outside of Roch Castle Hotel and set in the private grounds of the property.

GeneralComments:
Roch Castle, Pembrokeshire sits high above the landscape offering panoramic views over St Brides Bay and the Preseli Hills. Choose a bed and breakfast stay or take exclusive use and indulge in unique accommodation, fine dining at Blas Restaurant, at our sister hotel, Twr y Felin and the perfect location to explore the UKâ€™s only truly coastal National Park.

Complimentary transfers are available to and from Blas Restaurant at Twr y Felin Hotel each evening and luggage transfers are available for guests staying at either or our sister hotels, former windmill Twr y Felin, or 19th century priory, Penrhiw.

Our rates are per room per night, based on two guests sharing and include VAT, parking and Wi-Fi. Book direct for a preferred rate.

Note: Due to its historic nature, Roch Castle is not suitable for guests with walking difficulties or children under 12 years. As a hypo-allergenic property, we cannot accept pets. 

www.rochcastle.com
